summary: The diff implements all 5 requirements with strong evidence. REQ-1 removes duplicate text from StartJourneyScreen. REQ-2 changes AnimatedTravelFallback to 20-second transitions. REQ-3 adds comprehensive audio effects using useSfx hooks across multiple components. REQ-4 and REQ-5 restore road scenes after breakpoint and issue via new flow states and ClickToContinueHint component. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
